modName: Companion Girls - 4 New Companion To Skyrim - Remade
summary: This Mod Adds 4 New Companions to Skyrim. Read Inside For More Info.
descriptionHtml:
=================================================================
Important -> If you Do Not Like The Girls Beacase u Think They Are Ugly,
Simply Do Not Download. And. I Am Again Going To Make Another one
With Much Prettier. I Will Make A Test Mod And Post It. It Will be The One
After This. thank you For Reading.
================================================================

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Desc. And Info About This Mod

- Adds A 4 New Companions To Skyrim. 

-> Daria
-> Horatia
-> Bernice
-> Adela

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- Very Useful Mod When Going Some were Dangerous.
- Located At - The Bannered Mare In Whiterun

Mod Requirements

- ApachiiSkyHair NPC Overhaul 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Info About Future Mods

- I will Be making Companion Mods, So If U Like These Things Make Sure U Add Me :)

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

info about Other/Permissions

- I Allow Mod Reviews. Just Comment In The Comments The Link :) (Or Pm Me)
- I Do Not Give Permission To Copy This Mod. yet I Do Allow translations.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
